m64tweak.description:
WARNING: Overwrites Bacon's improved camera tweak.
Removes the side-to-side movement that Mario makes with his head, like in the beta. Overwrites the unused Mario function so be warned other ASM codes may also write there.
It is unknown who created the original gameshark code. If you know, please tell Miles#5198 For reference, the original gameshark code: 812E37C2 00C1 812E37D6 00C1 812E37F2 00C1 812E386E 00A8 812E3892 00B8 812E38BA 00B8
